attributes.action: Ban the general public sale of fireworks.
attributes.additional_details: To prevent the antisocial use of fireworks, unnecessary deaths to animals due to fear and to prevent fires and deaths.
attributes.background: To review the sale of fireworks and who can buy them. They should only be available to professional displays.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
